text: Leander Vyvey (born 21 Dec 1989) is a European actor and retired professional kite surfer. He had national and international victories between 2007 and 2009. == Early life & Professional career == Leander started his career as a professional kitesurfer, winning national and international competitions from 2007 to 2009. He was the Belgian Freestyle Champion and won the Super Grand Slam Kiteboard Pro World Cup in Italy in 2008. His career included several serious accidents, such as a crash at Big Bay, South Africa, in 2007, and a major injury in Maui, Hawaii, in 2009 ending his involvement in the World Tour. Leander ran his pro center in Dakhla, Western Sahara and got involved in various kitesurf related businesses. In 2013, after an accident that left him unconscious, Vyvey made a surprising pivot to acting. He trained in London, and later at The Second City in Chicago. Leander made his acting debut in the feature film Rescue Under Fire in 2016 and has been working on various TV series and feature films since. == Personal life == Leander is fluent in several languages and is passionate about ocean conservation. Despite his public career, he remains largely inactive in media endeavours, and little is known about his personal life. == Filmography == * Rescue Under Fire (2017) * The Postcard Killings (2020) * Before We Die (2021) * Professor T (2021) * FBI: International (2021) * Mijn Beste Slechtste Vriendin (2021-2022) * Then You Run (2023) * The Last Front (2024) == References == Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian actors
title: Leander Vyvey
